about_the_game:
Demon Lord Army Set1 is an enemy image asset collection and enemies face assets.

This incredible package features a diverse array of enemy pictures, boasting over 100 unique designs. From menacing snakes and fierce scorpions to mischievous slimes, mythical chimeras, captivating harpies, majestic manticores, cunning goblins, formidable orcs, and majestic dragons!

Get ready for an epic journey with this extensive enemy asset collection!


■ 126 enemy images (for frontview battle)
■ 57 enemy face images

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
